lead_paragraph: The new proposed buyer for the shuttered Revel Casino Hotel said Wednesday that he will not give up his legal challenge to the auction of the Atlantic City, New Jersey, complex even though the winning bidder walked away from the deal.

headline.main: Revel Deal With Brookfield Off; New Buyer in Sight
headline.print_headline: Revel Deal With Brookfield Off; New Buyer in Sight
